creator: Jug Jug Jeeve
descriptionHtml:
✓ Create stunning videos using photo video maker. Make any type of video, from family video slideshows to professional videos.
✓Video Maker using Photos, Videos and Music Add Texts, Effects and Transitions Share by Email, Blogs, Facebook, Youtube Burn to DVD and save as a Video file
✓ Make a movie, or edit a video using your photos, clips and music directly on your phone!

✓ How to Make a Slideshow with Music for Free
Slideshows are great — they let you showcase photos, present information, or turn a collection of photos into a video. But making them with traditional software can be a pain. Figuring out how to use PowerPoint or Keynote can take hours if you're not familiar with them. So let's look at a better way to make your own slideshow.

✓ Let's take a look at how to use this tool to make a picture slideshow with music.
★ select images.
★ add audio,sticker and many other effects.
★ Create your slideshow.
★ save video.
★ Share your masterpiece with the world.

✓ Photo Video Maker is the easiest way to create, edit and share amazing music videos, slideshows and stories with your photos, videos and free licensed music

✓ 100 Video Tracks
Utilize up to 100 layers of media to create epic stories with Photo video maker.

✓ Photo and Video Editor
Add smooth and stunning video effect to your Photo Videos and Slideshows, Status and Movies to make it more likely and creative.

✓ Celebrate Special Moments
Combine photos and video clips to create a video slideshow set to music to celebrate a joyous event.

✓ Creative Effects
Apply transitions, motion elements, filters, and more to any video track.

✓ Photo Video Maker with Song : Photo Slideshow Application through you may create Image Slideshow from your mobile, gives seconds, with Slide time, frames and filters, textures or Add new and Different sticker’s Effects.

✓ Say Happy Birthday
Pair photos and video clips with text and music to create a birthday video for a friend or loved one.

✓ Promote Your Business
Make eye-catching video promos for Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube to promote your products.

✓ Audio Equalizer
Fine tune your music, dialogue, and other audio clips.

✓ Photo Video Editor is the easiest way to create, edit and share amazing music videos, slideshows and stories with your photos.
✓ The Slideshow Video Maker is compatible with all the popular formats like JPEG, TIFF, PNG, MP4, AVI, DVD, GIF, MP3, and with more rare ones.
✓ Photo video maker with music is really intuitive and has simple interface, so you can edit your files without any help.

✓ Make a slideshow
✓ Now you can add more files if you want and change their order until you like it. Then add an audio track, trim it and click "Create".

✓ using photo video maker with music You don't need any special editing skills because video maker is super simple-to-use. Just select the images and make a video!

✓ Create your amazing video story using Photo to video story maker and share this on Whatsapp status or Instagram story.

✓ You can make Video Show for any occasions with our themes and movies and status templates like - Birthday , Love , Anniversary, Funny and Inspirational.

✓ photo Video Maker With Music is the easiest way to create, edit and share amazing photo music videos.

✓ Please download and use Photo video maker, create and share videos with your friend and family.
If you like photo video maker, please write some good reviews to encourage us.
